name: Capital International Limited
goal:
Capital International Limited (CIL) is a UK investment management firm and Capital International Management Company Limited (CIMC) is a Luxembourg UCITS management company, both are part of Capital Group (CG), a global firm of discretionary investment managers. CG is headquartered in Los Angeles, California and was founded in 1931.

CG provides investment management services globally. In Europe, CG manages a family of Luxembourg UCITS funds known as the Capital Group Funds. In the US, CG manages a family of US mutual funds known as the American Funds. CG also provides segregated investment management services to institutions globally including pension funds, charities, corporates and sovereign wealth funds.

As such our organisation closely follows the adoption, and implementation, of new financial services and related regulation that is relevant to our business as both a discretionary investment manager and fund manager. In the European Union, CIL works with CIMC on this function.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
